Html:
I am new to OOXML and I want to learn how to make tables with text in Word.

To start, how would I create a 4 x 4 table with some plain text in each cell?

I'm using the following class:

DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Wordprocessing.Document doc = document.MainDocumentPart.Document;

What would the code be to add my desired table with text to this document?
